amendment.description: To require the Under Secretary for Emergency Preparedness and Response to propose new inspection guidelines within 90 days of enactment that prohibit inspectors from entering into a contract with any individual or entity for whom the inspector performs an inspection for purposes of determining eligibility for assistance from the Federal Emergency Management Agency.

action.text: Amendment SA 1194 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Nelson FL.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1194 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
